markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Localized Quake](/Spells.aspx?ID=1799)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 374 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot emanation or 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures. Choose whether the spell's area is a 15-foot emanation or a 15-foot cone when you cast it. Each creature in the area standing on solid ground takes 4d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex saving throw. A creature that fails its save also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6.
name: Localized Quake

summary_markdown: You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures.
text: Localized Quake Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 374 2.0 Domain Earth Area 15-foot emanation or 15-foot cone Defense basic Reflex --- You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures. Choose whether the spell's area is a 15-foot emanation or a 15-foot cone when you cast it. Each creature in the area standing on solid ground takes 4d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex saving throw. A creature that fails its save also falls prone. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.
